title: Dragon Glitch - Can't attack you in certain spot
body:
So i emailed player support and they told me to make a thread here....

So pretty much what happened was I was playing Wukong Jg in a ranked game (Yolo). I went for a level 4 dragon because the enemy team didn't have vision on it and their Lee was mid lane.
ANYWAY, I w'd it, making a clone, and after the clone went away the dragon wouldn't attack me...maybe it was the square i was standing in. 
I don't know HOW i did it, I just know that I did it. I haven't tried to do it again.
I have a video i recorded which I sent to all my mates. If needed, I can upload or send this video somewhere.

Just would like this patched as unfair bugs and glitches could give players the extra advantage over others, which isn't fair.

Cheers, 
I P In Pools

replies.body:
"So i emailed player support and they told me to make a thread here...."

They wouldn't tell you to put it on this board. Why go against something else they said? That completely removes their integrity. Head over to the [bug report boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) for this.

Also the fact that you're unable to consistently repeat it does get rid of its believability, and possible solution.

1. I havent tried to repeat it

2. I recorded a video on snapchat, which i saved for proof

3. Ill post there when i get home

Provability isn't going to help, however. If the glitch cannot be repeated then it cannot be resolved, as the conditions for which the glitch occurs in are unknown, thus making fixing it impossible.

Sorry if I was being a bit ambiguous with my previous statement. Everything I've said is still true, though.
And also, they did tell me to post here. They even gave me a link

Oh wow really? An actual link to the *Help and Support* boards, not the Bug Report?

They must really not care.
